level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-42, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-5714.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-268, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-5702.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-5701.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 35-1215 [§ 31-5715, 2001 Ed.] was also amended by D.C. Law 12-81 to validate a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Department of Insurance abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-5702.
